root: ^There you are. Do you have a moment?
^I think we all are, a little.
^You seem like you have everything under control all of the time.
^I can assure you that is not true.
^You just manage to stay so composed.
^That doesn't mean anything about what's going on in my mind.
^In that case, what is going on in your mind?
^I enabled an attack on an innocent house. I keep taking everyone's advice on what I should do that I'm not taking the time to consider what I think best.
^I have succeeded as a detective by trusting my own intuition, yet I have lost that trust. Now I have only made things worse.
^Things would have become worse regardless of what you had done. That is the consequence of war. But know that I will always support you.
^I don't know if you fully understand. In my life there is no one I talk to. There is no one I feel comfortable talking to. At least, that was the case until you came crashing into my studio.
^Don't be. You had no control of where that portal would take you.
^Listen. The way I feel about you is unlike anything I have experienced before. I feel comfortable when you're around, even if you ask me to do something I would have never considered before.
^Even if you aren't all pulled together, I can trust that you have good intention. When I am with you, I feel more confident in my own ability.
^In fact, after this war is ended, I was thinking about moving my studio closer to here.
^Do you really want to do that?
^I am not sure. I don't believe House Belladonna even likes me anyway.
^Yeah, that would do it. So are you really going to relocate?
^I am not sure. I am considering it. What do you think?

YOUSHOULDLEAVE: ^Well, if someone is considering separating from a house, you know I would support that.
^It's up to you, but I think leaving might be nice. You get to be closer to here, and you can keep making music without angering your neighbors.
^If you really want to do it, then I say you should go for it.
YOUSHOULDSTAY: ^Well, leaving a house is a big change.
^I'm just worried that you would struggle to find your footing outside of it.
^If you want to, I won't stop you. But consider how drastic of a change that is. I don't want you to make a decision like that too suddenly.
^Of course. I will continue to think about it, but perhaps I should wait.
